file.name: nested-api.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3

info:
  title: chicken
  version: 0.0.0

paths:
  /get:
    post:
      operationId: getOneThing
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/GetOneThingRequest"
      responses:
        200:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/GetOneThingResponse"
        201:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/GetThingDataResponse"
        202:
          description: thing nested
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ThingNested"

components:
  requestBodies:
    GetOneThingRequest:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "nested/nested-schemas-1.yml#/components/schemas/ThingKey"

  responses:
    GetOneThingResponse:
      description: one thing
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "nested/nested-schemas-1.yml#/components/schemas/Thing"
    GetThingDataResponse:
      description: thing data
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "nested/nested-schemas-2.yml#/components/schemas/ThingData"

  schemas:
    ThingNested:
      $ref: "nested/nested-schemas-2.yml#/components/schemas/ThingNested"

Error: parse: paths: /get: post: getOneThing: requestBody: resolve "#/components/requestBodies/GetOneThingRequest" reference: content: application/json: parse schema: parse schema: reference "nested/nested-schemas-1.yml#/components/schemas/ThingKey": resolve reference "nested/nested-schemas-1.yml#/components/schemas/ThingKey": invalid schema reference "nested/nested-schemas-1.yml#/components/schemas/ThingKey"
